meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: The suitablenesses of the outfit impressed the fashion designer.
meanings.sent2: She carefully considered the suitablenesses of each candidate before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The party planner ensured the suitablenesses of the decorations matched the theme perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The suitablenesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy for the child to complete the picture.
meanings.sent5: The suitablenesses of the ingredients in the recipe determined its success.

meanings.definition: The state of being well-suited or fitting for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: His suitablenesses for the job were evident in his skills and experience.
meanings.sent2: The suitablenesses of the tool for the task made the work efficient.
meanings.sent3: The cat's suitablenesses for catching mice made it the perfect pet for the farmhouse.
meanings.sent4: The suitablenesses of the key in the lock allowed the door to open smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The suitablenesses of the actor for the role brought the character to life on stage.
